## IImportResolveOptions interface

Common options shared by [IImportResolveModuleOptions](./node-core-library.iimportresolvemoduleoptions.md) and [IImportResolvePackageOptions](./node-core-library.iimportresolvepackageoptions.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IImportResolveOptions 
```

</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ If true, then resolvePath is allowed to refer to the package.json of the active project.

</td><td>

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ A function used to resolve the realpath of a provided file path.


</td></tr>

[includeSystemModules?](./node-core-library.iimportresolveoptions.includesystemmodules.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ If true, if the package name matches a Node.js system module, then the return value will be the package name without any path.
